summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Twenty-fifth Avenue North, from East Helen Street to East Galer Street; East Lee Street, East Highland Drive and East Prospect Street, each from Twenty-fourth Avenue North to Twenty-fifth Avenue North, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same and providing for the necessary surface drainage, all in accordance with Resolution No. 2125 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
